content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(-15, -50)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Furnace group at position(40, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Chest group at position(43.5, -82.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5) 
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-81.5) 
-  Chest (position x=40.5, y=-80.5) 
-  Chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5) 
-  Chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5) 

### Inserter group at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) 

### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of 
-  Steam engine (position x=10.5, y=10.5) 
-  Boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5) 
-  Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5) 
-  Pipe group (fluid system 9066) 
-  Pipe group (fluid system 9062) 
-  Electricity group (id 9023) 

### Lab at position unknown
Consists of 
-  Lab (lab input={'automation-science-pack': 67}) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using inserter but having no items to insert
-  Ensure you have items to insert before using an inserter
### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure you have ingredients to smelt before using a furnace
### Errors when using burner mining drill but being out of fuel
-  Ensure you have fuel before using a burner mining drill
### Errors when using boiler but being out of fuel
-  Ensure you have fuel before using a boiler
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
-  Ensure you have input liquid before using a steam engine
### Errors when using steam engine but having no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure you have fluid present in connections before using a steam engine
### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure you have the necessary items to set research
### Errors when getting research progress
-  Ensure you have the necessary items to get research progress
### Errors when trying to extract items from chest but chest is empty
-  Ensure the chest is not empty before trying to extract items
### Errors when trying to extract items from inventory but inventory is empty
-  Ensure the inventory is not empty before trying to extract items
### Errors when trying to place item into a tile which is occupied by another entity
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied before trying to place an item
### Errors when trying to place item into a tile which is not a valid position
-  Ensure the tile is a valid position before trying to place an item
